body.name: Diono Monterey 2XT Latch 2 in 1 High Back Booster Car Seat with Expandable Height & Width, Side Impact Protection, 8 Years 1 Booster, Plum
features: 8 Years One Booster - for your big kid from 40 - 120 lb. It's all you will ever need.
Easy-adjust - 11-position headrest that grows up with your child. Engineered for safety and comfort with 2 layers of Side Impact Protection.
One of a kind - easy-adjust expandable backrest allows up to 6.5 in to grow with your big kid. With 2 layers of Side Impact Protection and deep padded cushioning.
Two built-in retractable 2-in-1 cup holder and snack tray - keeps your big kid's drink close at hand and stows away their essentials.
Our contoured premium soft fabrics - with layered foam padding that provide comfort and support can be easily removed for machine washing.
body.description: Welcome a world of flexibility with Monterey 2XT. Suitable from 40 - 120 lb approx. 4 - 12 years. We all know that children grow at different rates, and not one size fits all. As one of the most flexible car seats youll find, Monterey 2XT is lightweight, super portable and with adjustable headrest and expandable sides, plus easily converts into a backless booster seat, ensuring a proper fit for your little one at every age. Featuring 11 headrest positions and 2 recline positions, Monterey 2XT can adapt quickly to growing children, with plenty of room for shoulders, hips and legs. A simple-to-use dial on the back adjusts the width of the seat up to 20 in wide, while the headrest adjusts up to 6.5 in height with one hand for an easy precise fit. Clever design thinking and award-winning safety features make the Diono difference. Thats why the Monterey 2XT includes our superior side impact protection with aluminum reinforced head support and energy absorbing EPS foam, to accommodate growth spurts without sacrificing protection. Equipped with simple connectors and front adjusters, Monterey 2XT can securely connect to your vehicle in seconds, enhancing safety and stability as well as allowing parents to switch between vehicles with ease. Lovingly engineered for every journey with 2x fold away cup holders to keep drinks or snacks upright and within reach, so both children and parents can sit back and relax.

productInformation.value: ‎Covers: Machine wash cold, line dry. Shell and Components: Spot clean

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diono Engineering Safety that grows with your child, including Reinforced Side Impact Protection, 2-in-1 High Back to Backless Mode, 11 Headrest Positions and Expandable Side Walls, Ergonomic Seat base, and Quick, Secure Installation with LATCH Connectors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Booster Seat
reviews.reviewText: We have two kids and both of them have one. They both find it comfortable. I found it easy to put together and get in the car. Lots of adjustability without being complicated at all. Works great with the cars seatbelt, so getting in and out is easy. Really, there's nothing to dislike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Recently switched to booster seat as the car seat seatbelt were out of place and too low on the shoulder and it was time to get a new one. The car seat was seat to install and assemble. I just did a quick video search on website and can figure it out easily. The seats are wide and the head pieces are in great position

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great booster seats (we have four)
reviews.reviewText: I bought one for our oldest daughter. It was so good we got one for my wife's car. Now our twins are old enough, so we bought two more for them (this review). It was good enough to buy four and we might get another for my car.The attachment to the latch anchors is so easy. The pull from the front to tighten it is so much easier than any other car seat I have used. They are also light enough that I don't mind taking them in and out, but they still have good coverage and seem safe,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great slim car seat
reviews.reviewText: This our second Diono car seat. Love the brand and this design. It fits very well into our Tesla model 3 and the red looks great against the white seats. Can always count on Diono to be well constructed and safe for our little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Son Loves This Chair
reviews.reviewText: We recently transitioned from the baby-seat to this one for my 4 year old son. He's tall, but light, and my wife was very insistent on following the weight guidance for transitioning him to a new seat. When we did transition, my son was so happy! He loves the little cup and snack holders. The seat itself seems very comfortable, and my sone thoroughly enjoys the increased movement that the chair offers.It is very easy to install, although I do have to say that the installation instructions themselves stink. It took longer to try to figure out how to install the chair than to actually install it, and now that we know the trick, it is very easy to install.It seems very secure, and has been through one minor fender-bender with good performance. Overall, I would recommend this chair as a safe and comfortable alternative for children growing out of baby seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Land Rover Discovery and Range Rover Sport
reviews.reviewText: Works great in a Land Rover Discovery! Overall the kids say its super comfortable.However, in a Range Rover Sport the seat is too wide at its base to allow the seat belt to buckle. Would not recommend it for that vehicle. I'm going to try the Diono Monterey 5iST FixSafe next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not fit Tesla Model 3
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is too wide to fit in a Tesla Model 3. It will cover the seat belt. And since the carseat is attached using the latch hooks, you can't wiggle the seat belt in.Fits perfectly in my 2019 Chrysler Pacifica.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this car seat for my 5yr . His a big boy so getting a car seat that can fit his size and height for his age is hard so I went with this car seat and I liked how you can adjust the height and width on the seat. They also look very nice and well build and it was easy to install and uninstall.
If your little guy is on the husky side this seat is so comfortable and the little guy has room to breathe. I liked it so much I bought another for the kids!

reviews.reviewTitle: My child is very comfortable and safe
reviews.reviewText: My child is very comfortable and safe, in this seat. The head rest is perfect for head protection. Also very easy to use and install
This is the XT not the 2XT.
